titles.title: Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Donald M. Payne, Jr.
Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Donald M. Payne, Jr.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sorrow of the House of Representatives upon the announcement of the death of the Honorable Donald M. Payne, Jr., a Representative from New Jersey.
